price: (Deε wͻka ne sε): Yε deε yεrema mo aduane adi de ahwehwε Nyankopͻn hͻ animuonyam; yεnhwehwε akatua anaa aseda bi wͻ mo hͻ.
arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innamā nuṭ'ʿimukum liwajhi al-lahi lā nurīdu minkum jazāan walā shukūran
